chapters.title: Chapter 16: Tellings of the Wheel
chapters.info: Prince of the Dawn, p. 273 (379)—Title by which Lews Therin Telamon was known during the War of the Shadow. Rand uses it when being introduced to the Andoran nobles who supported Morgase in order to make them accept who he is. See also Dragon, The; Lord of the Morning; Telamon, Lews Therin.
